short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate various summaries of website article using OpenAI GPT-3.5.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Immersive Summary - Your reading assistant ✨

★ Usage ★
1. Install the extension.
2. Click on the extension icon on any website to access the summary tool, which will be displayed in the upper right corner of the webpage.
3. You can simply click the extension icon once more to hide the summary tool. Additionally, you have the option to enable the automatic display of the summary tool on every website by accessing the extension options page.

★ Features ★
🔍 Summarize with Ease: With just a click, extract key insights from any webpage. Choose from multiple summary formats – get a quick overview, identify essential nouns and concepts, or explore through thought-provoking questions and answers.

🌐 Translate on the Fly: Immersive Summary can translate and display the summary result in 100+ languages.

★ PS ★
You need to set the API Key and Server URL in the extension options first before using it.

If you have any needs, please comment.
